data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Zhou, Zheng-Xiang, Yang, Lin, Chen, Xiang-Sheng (2018): Parasogata gen. n., a new genus of the tribe Delphacini with descriptions of two new species from China (Hemiptera, Fulgoromorpha, Delphacidae). ZooKeys 806: 73-85, DOI: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.806.26394, URL: http://dx.doi.org/10.3897/zookeys.806.26394
